function.name: select
function.description: In an HTML-select box, executing select marks the option node as selected . If the boolean parameter select equals true, it selects the option, if false then it’s deselected.

example.description: Assuming we have an HTML-file select.html containing the following:

examples.example: <select> <option value="volvo"> Volvo </option> <option value="saab" selected="selected"> Saab </option> <option value="mercedes"> Mercedes </option> <option value="audi"> Audi </option> </select>
